definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: To make white or yellow hot-melt traffic paint.
sentences.chinese: 白色或黄色热熔道路标线涂料。

sentences.english: Bring your vehicle to a complete stop at the stop line if it is marked on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 如公路上划有标线，控制车辆在停车线前完全停车。

sentences.english: I get established in the 500-foot line.
sentences.chinese: 我在500英尺标线的位置上开始做这个动作。

sentences.english: Here you see the famous sodium yellow lines.
sentences.chinese: 这是著名的钠元素的，黄色标线。

sentences.english: Weight on the left foot with the feet slightly open.
sentences.chinese: 重心保持在左脚，双脚沿目标线稍稍打开。

sentences.english: So Charles' club is coming nicely on top of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯的球杆是顺着目标线，从球的正上方去触球。

sentences.english: Hot-melt line is at present our country road marking on the most widely used a marking.
sentences.chinese: 热熔标线是目前我国道路标线上应用最广的一种标线。

sentences.english: Hot-melt line is at present our country road marking on the most widely used a marking.
sentences.chinese: 热熔标线是目前我国道路标线上应用最广的一种标线。

sentences.english: Hot-melt line is at present our country road marking on the most widely used a marking.
sentences.chinese: 热熔标线是目前我国道路标线上应用最广的一种标线。

sentences.english: Every time they repainted the lines on the road you would have to buy a new car.
sentences.chinese: 每一次道路标线重画时，你就得买一部新车。

sentences.english: Flame lit the broken white line he had followed from Tucson.
sentences.chinese: 火焰吞噬着他从土桑市跟随而来的破破烂烂的路标线。

sentences.english: It has range-finding reticle and built-in compensator for bullet drop.
sentences.chinese: 具有测距标线和内置的子弹下降补偿。

sentences.english: Position the cursor outside the reticle, adjacent to one of the horizontal markers.
sentences.chinese: 将游标置于标线外，与其中一个水平标识相邻。

sentences.english: I have to be able to see where the 500-foot corner marker is on the right side of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我要尽量看到人观众右侧500英尺标线的那个位置。

definition: traffic camera/speed camera/closed-circuit TV police surveillance
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
